Keywords: Avengers , Cosmic , Police
Real Name: Monica Rambeau
Special Powers
SPEED OF LIGHT: When Monica Rambeau uses Phasing/Teleport or Running Shot, after resolutions roll a d6. 4-6: Choose one: *Action total +1 until the end of the turn. *You may place her in the square she occupied when given the action.
LIVING ENERGY: Phasing/Teleport. When Monica Rambeau uses it, after resolutions she may make an attack, but only to target an opposing character she moved through this turn, regardless of adjacency, range, or line of fire.

Comments
February 15, 2022
reanimationguy
I’ve had a couple friends use Monica against me, and she’s great. Being able to choose close or range for her attack after phasing is amazing. I do wish she started with a single click of that move special on her lower dial, possibly trading off a click of health or adding to her cost for it. As it stands, a careful opponent probably won’t let her get much mileage, if any, out of it on her lower line.
January 7, 2022
hoojeebo
1) Yes, you get to choose close or ranged for her phasing attack. 2) No, she doesn't get to do a triple-target with her phasing attack. 3) The yo-yo power is awesome; this is a way better power than Hypersonic anyway, and having used it, I can tell you that not only is it awesome, but I prefer it to HSS.
January 7, 2022
nelson2208
For a character we don't get very often, this is a dominant dial. WOW
January 3, 2022
The Singularity
This roll a D6 and on 4-6 go back yo-yo thing is a lame way to substitute for hypersonic. Quicksilver and Monica were done dirty in this set. Would have much rather seen someone else made than incomplete versions of loved characters.
December 22, 2021
FlashSpidey
This piece looks really fun to play. Love the values and powers. I have a question about how her phasing power works. Do you get to pick to make a range or close attack or do meshing? Or which one is done? Sorry if this is dumb.
December 12, 2021
BLsquared
Not sure if she can triple target with the phasing, it does say "targeting [U]an[/U] opposing character".
December 7, 2021
Goop
I'm assuming she can still triple target using her phase around special power. If so she's not bad at all. On the right map you can get to a safe spot and either pen blast or CCE her targets whatever is going to suit you better. Decent defense and attack values/powers the whole way. 150pts is a lot but she's pretty good for it.
